title: MD
biography: Nobel Prize. Associated with Rockefeller University.
aiSummary: Charles Rice is a virology specialist with an H-index of 166 at Rockefeller University (Member). Has been published in Science, Nature, Nature Reviews Microbiology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.

awards.name: Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine
awards.issuingBody: Nobel Assembly at the Karolinska Institute
awards.contribution: For the discovery of the Hepatitis C virus, which led to the development of effective antiviral treatments that have saved millions of lives.
